text: Bruno Enrico Veglio Araújo (born 12 February 1998) is a Uruguayan footballer who plays as a midfielder for Montevideo Wanderers F.C. in the Uruguayan Primera División. ==References== ==External links== *Profile at World Football Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Montevideo Wanderers F.C. players Category:Uruguayan Primera División players Category:Uruguayan footballers Category:Association football midfielders
title: Bruno Veglio
